verbs.description: As [ARG0: he] [V: launches] [ARG1: his drive to reduce prescription drug costs] , Donald Trump can use a rarely - invoked law to let other manufacturers compete with Narcan .
As [ARG0: he] launches his drive to [V: reduce] [ARG1: prescription drug costs] , Donald Trump can use a rarely - invoked law to let other manufacturers compete with Narcan .
As he launches his drive to reduce prescription drug costs , Donald Trump [V: can] use a rarely - invoked law to let other manufacturers compete with Narcan .

[ARGM-TMP: As he launches his drive to reduce prescription drug costs] , [ARG0: Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: use] [ARG1: a rarely - invoked law] [ARG2: to let other manufacturers compete with Narcan] .
As he launches his drive to reduce prescription drug costs , [ARG0: Donald Trump] can use a rarely - invoked law to [V: let] [ARG1: other manufacturers compete with Narcan] .
As he launches his drive to reduce prescription drug costs , Donald Trump can use a rarely - invoked law to let [ARG0: other manufacturers] [V: compete] [ARG1: with Narcan] .
